humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the left axillary sentinel lymph node (one lymph node) has no evidence of metastatic carcinoma. This is confirmed by negative staining for pancytokeratin. Additionally, there is no mention of any other lymph nodes being positive for metastasis. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'A. Left axillary Sentinel lymph node: One lymph node, no evidence of metastatic carcinoma', which indicates that there is no metastasis in the sentinel lymph node. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
